title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree - the ultimate indoor playground for your furry friends! 

This 2-in-1 Cat Condo and Cat Sisal Scratching Post is designed to provide a cozy and entertaining space for your indoor kitten or small cats. Made with high-quality 600g skin-friendly plush and soft carpet, it ensures a comfortable and safe environment for your beloved pets. 

Safety is our top priority, which is why we've incorporated a stable base design that prevents tipping and wobbling. For added stability, we recommend placing it on a flat floor against the wall. 

But that's not all - the TSCOMON Cat House Cat Tree also serves as a decorative piece for your home! With its green leaves design, it seamlessly integrates with your indoor plants, bringing a touch of nature into your living space. 

This cat tree offers both rest and play features. Your feline friends will love the hang ball, providing endless entertainment and exercise. The scratching post, made with durable sisal material, satisfies their natural urge to scratch, keeping your furniture safe and intact. 

Setting up the TSCOMON Cat House Cat Tree is a breeze! With easy assembly in just three simple steps, you can have it ready for your cats to enjoy within 1 to 8 minutes. Plus, we provide all the necessary tools for your convenience. 

At TSCOMON, we are committed to providing quality products and attentive service. Customer satisfaction is our greatest pursuit, and we are always available to address any concerns or inquiries you may have. 

The dimensions of this cat tree are 11" x 15" x 41", making it large enough to accommodate kittens or one medium-sized cat. It comes in three stylish color options - Grey, Beige, and Green, allowing you to choose the perfect match for your home decor. 

With a weight of just 6 pounds, the TSCOMON Cat House Cat Tree is lightweight and easy to move around. It comes with a package that includes 1× Cat Tree, 1× Assembly Instruction, and 1× Set of Tools, ensuring a hassle-free setup process. 

Please remember to check the size before buying and ensure the safety of your children by not allowing them to play with the cat tree. 

Give your furry friends the gift of their dreams with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree. Order yours now and create a paradise for your cats right at home!

Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree - the perfect indoor sanctuary for your furry feline friend! With its innovative 2-in-1 design, this cat tree doubles as a cozy cat condo and a sisal scratching post, providing the ultimate play and rest space for your indoor kitten or small cats.

Crafted from high-quality 600g skin-friendly plush and soft carpet, this cat house ensures maximum comfort and durability. The safe and stable base design prevents tipping and wobbling, guaranteeing a secure and worry-free environment for your beloved pet. For added integration with your home decor, the leaves design serves as a delightful greenery addition, bringing a touch of nature indoors.

Rest easy knowing that assembly is a breeze, with easy-to-follow instructions and all the necessary tools included. In just 1 to 8 minutes, you'll have a stylish and functional cat house ready for your feline companion. We pride ourselves in providing top-notch customer service, with a commitment to delivering quality products and ensuring your satisfaction. Our contact information is readily available for any inquiries or assistance you may need.

The TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree measures 11" x 15" x 41" in overall dimensions, making it the ideal size for kittens or one medium-sized cat. Choose from our elegant color options of Grey, Beige, or Green to perfectly match your home decor.

Each package includes 1× Cat Tree, 1× Assembly Instruction, and 1× Set of Tools, ensuring a hassle-free setup experience. Please remember to check the size before purchasing and place the cat tree on a flat floor against the wall for enhanced stability. Additionally, ensure the safety of your little ones by not allowing children to play with the cat tree.

Give your furry friend the gift of comfort and entertainment with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree. Order yours today and let your cat indulge in hours of joyous play and relaxation!
